Reviews.Title: do NOT wast your money. DO NOT BUY.
Reviews.Author: The Moon
Reviews.Content: Battery does not accept any charge even with 5 hours charging.Motion detector does not work at all.repeated problems when connecting to the laptop.remote does not work as it should. most of the buttons are not working.So, DO NOT BUY.

Reviews.Title: Smoke Detector Hiddent Spy Camera
Reviews.Author: April Mitchell
Reviews.Content: When battery run out there is a flasing light, at this point the spy carmera is not hidden fromt the person you are tying to take.

ProductInfo.Features:
Smoke detector appearance, not a real smoke detector.
Motion detector recording; Pixel: 2.0 maga pixel; Scope for sound recording: 40m2.
Video Resolution: 1280*960, 30 FPS; Video format: AVI.
Viewing Angle: 72 degree;  Microphone: Built-in.
Capacity of memory card: 32GB maximally (not included).
